description:
Robust, breathable and sufficient freedom of movement: the merino shield light line combines everything required for a demanding alpine tour. The material mix withstands more than 100,000 abrasion cycles in the martindale test, which measures scuff resistance, and is one of the most durable of ortovox materials. Thanks to a narrow cut and extremely elastic material, these short brenta mountain pants for men ensure an ideal fit with sufficient freedom of movement in any situation.

In addition, merino mesh inserts in the waistband provide the necessary comfort. Features such as adjustable ankle cuffs, anatomically shaped knees, a hook-adjustable waistband and seamless, bonded laser-cut details make our brenta shorts for men technical items of mountain apparel.
name: Ortovox Brenta Shorts - Mens
